```{r library}
library(tidyverse)
library(data.table)
library(VennDiagram)
library(gtsummary)
```

```{r}
breast_dna <- read_rds("/Users/colinccm/Documents/GitHub/Gillis/breast_ch/breast_dna.rds")
germline_data <- read_rds("/Users/colinccm/Documents/GitHub/Gillis/breast_ch/germline_data.rds")
Global_data <- read_rds("/Users/colinccm/Documents/GitHub/Gillis/breast_ch/Global_data.rds")
```

# How many unique patient do we have in the data?

```{r, out.width='100%'}
venn.diagram(
  x = list(Global_data$deidentified_patient_id, germline_data$deidentified_patient_id),
  category.names = c("Clinical data" , "Germline data"),
  filename = 'Patients with germline data.png',
  output=TRUE,
  
  # Output features
  imagetype="png" ,
  height = 1000 , 
  width = 1000 , 
  resolution = 300,
  compression = "lzw",
  
  # Circles
  lwd = 2,
  lty = 'blank',
  fill = c(viridis::plasma(2)),# clin, germ, demo
  margin = 0.2,
  
  # Numbers
  cex = .6,
  fontface = "bold",
  fontfamily = "sans",
  cat.pos = c(90, 0),
  cat.dist = c(0.15, -0.09)
  # ext.percent = 2
  #ext.percent = 5
)
knitr::include_graphics('/Users/colinccm/Documents/GitHub/Gillis/breast_ch/Patients with germline data.png')
```

We have `r length(unique(germline_data$deidentified_patient_id))` unique breast cancer patients with a Blood sample.

```{r}
germline_data %>% 
  select("race_derived", "ethnicity_derived",
         "class_of_case", "clinical_tnm_group_stage", "combinations_of_er_pr_and_her2") %>% 
  tbl_summary()
```

# Patients who had blood before treatments

```{r}
germline_data %>% 
  select(blood_bf_chemo, blood_bf_horm, blood_bf_immu, blood_bf_rad, blood_bf_treatment#, blood_bf_treatment_30days
         ) %>% 
  tbl_summary()
```

# Focus on the patients with blood before treatments

```{r}
blood_bf_treat <- germline_data %>% 
  filter(blood_bf_treatment == "Yes")
```
